body_html: I had the exact same linking problem when trying to compile pytorch 0.3 with CUDA 9.1. I couldn't figure out how it manages to find and link to cublas.8. I gave up and installed the pip wheel package which contains CUDA, CuDNN everything inside.
body_text: I had the exact same linking problem when trying to compile pytorch 0.3 with CUDA 9.1. I couldn't figure out how it manages to find and link to cublas.8. I gave up and installed the pip wheel package which contains CUDA, CuDNN everything inside.
body: I had the exact same linking problem when trying to compile pytorch 0.3 with CUDA 9.1. I couldn't figure out how it manages to find and link to cublas.8. I gave up and installed the `pip` wheel package which contains CUDA, CuDNN everything inside.
